package.name: rtt_diagnostic_msgs
package.description:
Provides an rtt typekit for ROS diagnostic_msgs messages.
It allows you to use ROS messages transparently in RTT components and applications.
This package was automatically generated by the create_rtt_msgs generator and should not be manually modified.
See the http://ros.org/wiki/diagnostic_msgs documentation for the documentation of the ROS messages in this typekit.
package.author: create_rtt_msgs
